articles.original_title: BST: AI-Focused Portfolio With A Monthly Payout
articles.original_body: The BlackRock Science and Technology Trust offers tech exposure and a 7.25% monthly yield. Learn about its new growth strategy and key holdings.

articles.original_title: The $40 Billion Data Center Deal: BlackRock, Nvidia, Microsoft, and OpenAI Team Up
articles.original_body: Watch the Video When Lee told me that BlackRock, Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA), Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT), and OpenAI had pooled $40 billion to purchase data centers, it stopped me cold. That’s not just a headline deal — it’s a declaration that the world’s most powerful capital and AI players see exponential expansion ahead for cloud infrastructure. The Biggest Names in Tech Are ... The $40 Billion Data Center Deal: BlackRock, Nvidia, Microsoft, and OpenAI Team Up
